title: Loliware scores $15.4m to replace single-use plastics with seaweed-based materials - AgFunderNews
summary: Loliware is a company that has developed a way to make straws, utensils, and other single-use items from seaweed. Seaweed has several advantages over other materials currently used to make alt-plastics, including its fast growth cycle, its ability to capture carbon from the atmosphere, and the fact that it's oxygenating the ocean. Loliware's products are compostable and can decompose as fast as a banana peel.
